name: Come Here
description:
Edit :
**** Disclaimer ****
The camera might be a bit janky. If you get stuck, try moving it around by bringing the cursor to the bottom or the side of the screen. You'll find the dog eventually.
*********************

My submission for the GMTK 2020 48 hours game jam.

Theme : Out of control.

You need to guide the dog to the end goal by whistling! But make sure it doesn't get distracted along the way!

Controls : 

Left mouse button : Interact with objects.

Right mouse button : Whistle.

Escape : Quit the game.

To move the camera, move your cursor to the edge of the screen.

Credits :

All the assets were made by me, but not during the jam. They were from a previous unfinished project.

SFX made using Bfxr.

The music is one of my partner's old composition.

Hope you enjoy!
